questions.question: Polystyrene pattern is used in which of the following casting process:

explanations.a: Polystyrene patterns are used in the lost foam casting process. In this method, a polystyrene pattern of the desired part is created and then coated with a refractory material. When molten metal is poured into the mold, the polystyrene pattern vaporizes due to the heat, leaving behind a cavity that is filled with metal. This process is also known as evaporative pattern casting.
explanations.b: Polystyrene patterns are used in the lost foam casting process.
explanations.c: Polystyrene patterns are used in the lost foam casting process.
explanations.d: Polystyrene patterns are used in the lost foam casting process.
